txt.en:
'[placeholder], Orcs have begun to venture forth from several caverns within the valleys of the Isendale. They present a great threat to my people and must be driven back into their holes.

'They have been seen near rocky outcroppings around the bases of several of the hills to the east. You can reach the hills by travelling up the switchback to the north.

'Will you deal with these Orcs for me?'

'I fear that the Orcs might be traversing beneath the Isendale a long way to aid the Dunlendings. These are dark tidings, indeed, for it means that the Dunlendings have an ally who is determined to see them victorious.'
'[placeholder], there are still many Orcs threatening my position!'
Orcs have begun to appear along the southern ridge overlooking the Isendale.
Orcs can be found near the bases of many of the hills east of Innoth's camp.\n  \nInnoth has asked you to find the Orcs in the Isendale and drive them back into their caves.
Talk to Innoth near the Isen
Innoth is at his camp near the Isen.\n\nYou should inform Innoth that the Orcs have been driven back into their caves.
